Contributors

The following people contributed to the development effort of Article-Level Metrics:

  • Bryan Stearns - Original developer of the Article-Level Metrics application
  • Russell Uman
  • Fortnight Labs (Gerad Suyderhoud and Visnu Pitiyanuvath)
  • Joe Osowski - Software developer at PLOS
  • Jennifer Song - Software developer at PLOS
  • Martin Fenner - Software developer for PLOS (contract)
  • Martyn Whitwell - Software developer at Cottage Labs
  • Juan Pablo Alperin - Software developer for PKP
